basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Developer | AI/ML Support & Optimization
basics.summary: Software professional with university education and ~3 years of experience in development, data analysis, and technical support. Proven track record in optimizing AI/ML algorithms (TensorFlow), managing databases, and validating prototypes in production environments. Skilled in troubleshooting technical issues and developing automation tools to improve workflow efficiency.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led software development and AI/ML model optimization in a production environment.
highlights: Optimized AI/ML algorithms for 'AdCognition' (Python/TensorFlow), achieving over 90% detection accuracy.
Maintained and modified database interactions and Linux-based training infrastructure for ML services.
Validated prototypes like 'RoboGPT' by testing technology components and analyzing simulation data.
Remedied technical issues in the development process and supported deployment workflows via Docker/Nginx.
Performed code reviews and mentored junior staff on best practices and system integration.

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided technical support and developed internal automation tools.
highlights: Provided support and troubleshooting for internal processes, improving team efficiency.
Developed 'Otis', a tool to automate form creation, identify data errors, and streamline reporting.
Analyzed workflow data to implement JavaScript/RegEx automation for repetitive tasks.
Won 1st Place in Innovation Contest for finding technical solutions to operational challenges.

work.name: BigFoot Company
work.summary: Configured and developed software solutions with focus on UI/UX testing.
highlights: Developed and configured responsive dashboards using Nuxt.js/Vue 3.
Collaborated on API data integration and performed testing to ensure system stability.
Remediated UI inconsistencies and optimized load times across different browsers.

work.name: Trood
work.summary: Assisted in backend service configuration and data modeling.
highlights: Implemented and tested data models for backend services using Go and Node.js.
Configured API endpoints for inter-service communication and data collection.

courses: Bachelor Thesis: Building a Modern Fullstack Web Application

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Won for 'Otis' automation tool that streamlined templating and email workflows.

projects.name: AdCognition – End-to-End ML Ad Detection System
projects.description: Production Chrome extension for real-time ad detection linked to a Python/TensorFlow training stack.
highlights: Built ML pipeline (Python training → TFJS export) achieving 90%+ accuracy.
Deployed Flask ML services and monitored performance via TensorBoard on Linux.
Conducted testing and data analysis to optimize model inference speeds.

projects.name: Otis – Support Automation Tool
projects.description: Internal tool for templating and form filling that streamlined support workflows.
highlights: Significantly improved team efficiency through process automation.
Identified and proposed technical solutions for repetitive data entry tasks.
